com.server.jersey.aggregator

Class mysqlconnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.server.jersey.aggregator.mysqlconnector

  • public class mysqlconnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all database connections and almost all queries.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static java.sql.Connection connect()
        Creates connection to the database
        Returns:
        The connection if successfull, else null.

      • insertautonmapjob

        public static int insertautonmapjob(java.lang.String mys,
                                    int my_hash)
        Insert jobs we already sent to SA's to the database with AutoIncrement.
        Parameters:
        mys - Job string that was sent to SA.
        my_hash - Hash of SA that got the job.
        Returns:
        the AutoIncrement ID

      • insertnmapjob

        public static void insertnmapjob(int id,
                                 java.lang.String mys,
                                 int my_hash)
        Insert jobs we already sent to SA's to the database.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of job.
        mys - Job string that was sent to SA.
        my_hash - Hash of SA that got the job.

      • insertsqlresults

        public static void insertsqlresults(java.lang.Integer id,
                                    java.lang.String hostname,
                                    java.lang.String time,
                                    java.lang.String tasks,
                                    java.lang.String resulttt,
                                    java.lang.Integer periodic,
                                    int hash)
        Insert result returned from SA into database.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of job that gave the result.
        hostname - Hostname from result.
        time - Time the result was accepted by the server.
        tasks - Tasks from the result.
        resulttt - Ports from the result.
        periodic - 1 for periodic thread that generated this result, else 0.
        hash - Hash of SA that sent this result.

      • changesqlactivesagents

        public static void changesqlactivesagents(int hash,
                                          int active)
        Change active state of SAs in database.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash of SA.
        active - State to change the SA to. 1 for active, 0 for not active.

      • insertsqlsagents

        public static void insertsqlsagents(int hash,
                                    java.lang.String device,
                                    java.lang.String IP,
                                    java.lang.String MAC,
                                    java.lang.String OS,
                                    java.lang.String nmapver)
        Insert SAs into database.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash of SA.
        device - Device name of SA.
        IP - IP of SA.
        MAC - Mac Address of SA.
        OS - Operating System version of SA.
        nmapver - Nmap version of SA.

      • insertandroidcredentials

        public static void insertandroidcredentials(java.lang.String username,
                                            java.lang.String password)
        Insert credentials for android device connecting.
        Parameters:
        username - Username given by android device.
        password - Password given by android device.

      • dropdatabase

        public static void dropdatabase()
        Easy way to drop the whole database, was used for internal testing purposes.
